name: Repo OS Spec
purpose: Defines repo operating system: structure, invariants, naming, workflows.
next_action: Draft skeleton + invariants + folder map

name: Prompt Governance Framework
purpose: Versioning, approvals, deprecations, eval gates for prompts/agents.
next_action: Define prompt registry schema + versioning rules

name: Change Control & Release Process
purpose: Semantic versioning, changelog rules, rollback/hotfix path.
next_action: Define release tags + changelog template

name: Architecture Decision Records (ADR)
purpose: Lightweight decision log for architecture and product choices.
next_action: Add ADR template + rules for when to write

name: Definition of Done (Quality Bar)
purpose: Uniform completion criteria across prompts, code, tests, docs, security.
next_action: Create DoD checklist used in PRs

name: Backlog & Epic/Story Templates
purpose: Work item templates tuned for agent-assisted builds; acceptance criteria first.
next_action: Create issue templates + acceptance test pattern

name: Iteration Loop (Lightweight Sprint)
purpose: Plan→Build→Evaluate→Ship→Retro loop optimized for velocity.
next_action: Define cadence + artifacts created each cycle

name: PR Workflow & Review Checklist
purpose: PR checklist incl. prompt diffs, evidence, tests, governance gates.
next_action: Create PR template + required checks list

name: Issue Triage & Severity Model
purpose: How to classify and prioritize bugs, drift, incidents, debt.
next_action: Define Sev0-3 and response expectations

name: Project Scaffold Generator
purpose: Template for new services/apps with standard structure and defaults.
next_action: Pick tool (copier/cookiecutter) and define base template

name: Local Dev Harness
purpose: One-command dev/test/lint; pre-commit hooks; onboarding steps.
next_action: Add Makefile/task runner spec + env bootstrap

name: CI/CD Standard Pipeline
purpose: Build/test/lint/security/package/deploy stages + gating rules.
next_action: Define CI stages + required status checks

name: Configuration Management Standard
purpose: Config layering, env vars, secrets, per-env overrides, defaults.
next_action: Define config hierarchy + examples

name: Observability Standard
purpose: Logging/metrics/traces, correlation IDs, basic SLOs, dashboards hooks.
next_action: Define minimum telemetry + error taxonomy

name: Evaluation Framework (Evals)
purpose: Golden tests, regression suite, scoring, thresholds, drift detection.
next_action: Define eval dataset format + scoring + CI gate

name: Prompt+Model Interface Contract
purpose: Input/output schemas, tool contracts, error modes, retries/fallbacks.
next_action: Define tool schema + response contract + retry policy

name: RAG / Context Policy
purpose: Retrieval policy, citations, freshness rules, source ranking, guardrails.
next_action: Define source tiers + citation requirements

name: Safety & Policy Layer
purpose: Prompt injection defenses, PII handling, red-team checklist, safe tools.
next_action: Define safety checklist + threat model

name: Human-in-the-Loop Review
purpose: When humans must approve; how feedback becomes evals and improvements.
next_action: Define HITL triggers + review forms

name: Infrastructure-as-Code Baseline
purpose: Default IaC approach, env strategy, state management, modules.
next_action: Choose Terraform vs CDK baseline and document patterns

name: Identity & Access Framework
purpose: Least privilege, roles per service, secrets + KMS strategy.
next_action: Define role patterns + secrets handling

name: Network / Boundary Template
purpose: VPC patterns, endpoints, service boundaries, ingress/egress rules.
next_action: Define minimal network patterns and diagrams

name: Deployment Patterns
purpose: Blue/green or canary baseline; rollback procedure; env promotion.
next_action: Define minimal safe deploy + rollback flow

name: Cost & Tagging Standard
purpose: Tag taxonomy, cost ownership, budgets/alarms, reporting.
next_action: Define tag keys + budget alarms baseline

name: Project Knowledge Base Pattern
purpose: Docs structure, single source of truth rules, where decisions live.
next_action: Define docs tree + what goes where

name: Chat/Artifact Capture Workflow
purpose: How chats become ADRs, tasks, prompts, code changes; traceability.
next_action: Define capture steps + naming + linking rules

name: Index/Registry System
purpose: CSV registries for prompts/runbooks/services/releases; generation rules.
next_action: Define registry schemas + generation outputs

name: Repo OS Module
purpose: Hierarchical module implementing repo operating system; exposes its own control plane.
next_action: Fill remaining Repo OS planned items via created-items registry.
